item.title: Adding tagging
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:18, topic:534278”]I think something the forum could benefit from with using this system is being able to notify those who haven’t yet commented or viewed a topic but have a relation to it. For example, if someone contributed to a script another person is posting they may say “thanks for the help #name”.

However, this can be easy to abuse. The system may introduce things such as random notifications from newbies who tag anyone who is online for views. This would become irritating and cause members to rage and spam which is the last thing we need.

Overall, i believe that the weaknesses of this system outweigh the strengths and you should just message the member you wish to see the topic a link so they can click. If it isn’t broken don’t fix it or you will just break it.[/quote]

“You can only mention two users per post”
